#text=When I have a long day at work , I like to take a bath before I go to bed .
#text=They make me sleepy and feel nice .
#text=I start my bath by turning on the warm water faucet .
#text=Then I plug the drain so the water will stay in the tub .
#text=Sometimes I pour some bubble bath into the tub .
#text=When I do this , I pour a little bit of bubble bath liquid under the running water .
#text=Whenever the tub is about halfway full of water , I get in the tub and relax .
#text=Sometimes I read a book in the bathtub , and other times I simply sit there .
#text=When I am not reading , I often think about my day and what I will do tomorrow .
#text=After about 15 or 20 minutes , I decide to get out of the tub .
#text=I drain the water and bubbles , and my bath is over .
